name: Oranges In Love With My Fly
name_original: Oranges In Love With My Fly
description:
Lead your army of oranges, bananas and potatoes in a heroic quest to save your fly.

A game made for Ludum Dare 33. If you took part too, feel free to rate it here.

If you get stuck, watch this walkthrough. If you're interested in the story, there's a video made out story cutscenes. The game is also available on GameJolt.
